talk0126:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>I must attend to my duties, so sadly I
cannot show you around. However, I...

I hope that you will stay as long as you
please. You are never a stranger here.
talk0150:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oh, this won't do... I can't believe I
allowed myself to nod off like that.

I must keep studying if I have any hope of
becoming a great chief like Grandmother.

Master Link... Thank you for waking me.
talk0151:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Master Link, the hour is quite late. Please
don't worry about me. You should get
some rest.
I plan to head off to bed myself, after
studying for just a while longer...
talk0152:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Master Link...<sp:5:1:0> I am always happy to see
you, of course. It's just...<sp:5:1:0>well...<sp:5:1:0>

While I have somehow gotten used to
Mr. Tauro's state of dress, when it comes
to you... I, um...
I was wondering if maybe you wouldn't
mind...<sp:5:1:0>wearing a little more clothing.<sp:5:1:0>
Um, just for modesty's sake. <sp:5:1:0>If that's OK.<sp:5:1:0>
talk0153:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Master Link...<sp:5:1:0> As you are well aware, we Sheikah
have a deeply twisted history with that mask
you're wearing.
Some even feel a rush of fear just looking at it.<sp:5:1:0>
Out of respect for that, would you mind terribly
taking it off while in our village? Please?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0154:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>To us Sheikah, that garb is a symbol of something
truly loathsome.

As chief, I cannot allow myself to be seen speaking
to someone dressed like that.<sp:5:0:0> To that end, please
excuse me, Master Link.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
WakkaCharm: I hope that brings you luck.
talk0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I must follow your example and spend as
much time as I can out there ensuring
that the villagers are doing well.
I know that everyone has their own
worries weighing on them...

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I think of their worries as pages in the
diary of our village. One day, I hope they
will have faded into a distant memory.
talk0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Master Link...<sp:5:0:0> Is there anything you need
from me?

I haven't discerned anything about
Princess Zelda's whereabouts, so I'm
not sure I can be of any help to you.
However, my plan is to investigate the
Ring Ruins as thoroughly as possible.

Dorian, my aide, does not seem too happy
about it, but I believe this falls under my
duty as chief, and so it must be done.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>That's all I have for you at the moment...<sp:5:1:0>
Please stay as long as you please.
talk0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It seems my knowledge was useful
to Tauro and his colleague for their
investigation. I'm glad.
I believe that deepening our examination
of the Ring Ruins falls under my duty as
chief. Even still...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>In retrospect, I can see that I perhaps
got a bit carried away with this task...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>From now on, I intend to turn my focus
firmly toward the villagers. As their chief,
it is up to me to watch over the village.
Duty aside... Know that I am always
praying for your safety, Master Link.
Always.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Please... Take care of yourself as surely
as you take care of the rest of Hyrule.
talk0140:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>M-M...<sp:5:0:0>Master Link... Ahem, I...<sp:5:1:0> Um...


I have certainly come a long way when it
comes to my shyness, especially around
you.<sp:5:1:0> Oh! Around heroes LIKE you, I mean!
Still, it would help a great deal if...<sp:5:1:0> That is
to say, if it's not too much trouble...<sp:5:1:0>
Could you maybe put a shirt on?
talk0117:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Even though I've seen them many times
by now...

Whenever I approach the Ring Ruins,
my feet inexplicably stop in their tracks.

I wonder...for what purpose were they
built? And by whom?
talk0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's gotten quite late. Please rest
yourself, Master Link.

Upon exiting the structure, there's an inn
to the right. I hope...you find peaceful
sleep there.
talk0141:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Yes? Do you need...<sp:5:1:0>


...


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>M-M-M...<sp:5:0:0>MASTER LINK?!


I...I apologize... I was just so...surprised?
Yes. That. I was quite surprised.

To think that the subject of my prayers
would suddenly appear...
talk0142:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I was just this moment praying for your
safety during your perilous journeys,
Master Link.
Seeing your face when you found out that
the words "<clr:0000>Demon King<clr:ffff>" were written on
the stone slab... Oh, Master Link.
I knew at once that you must be carrying
the burden of a difficult quest upon your
broad...um, upon your shoulders.
All I can do is pray with all of my heart.
Please do take care of yourself.
talk0143:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Master Link... Could it be that you're
going somewhere?
talk0130:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I must do something to make up for
becoming so immersed in figuring
out the Ring Ruins.
I truly value my time with the villagers.
From now on, I will go out of my way to
make that much more apparent.
Please speak to the villagers as well,
Master Link. Your presence has a way of
bringing comfort to those around you.
talk0148:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>There is the matter of the monsters that
appear when darkness falls. At night,
please try to stay close to the village.
talk0131:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>During my investigation of the Ring Ruins,
I learned the importance of observing
anything and everything in your vicinity.
I will use this newfound wisdom to closely
observe the villagers and see what I can
see with my own two eyes.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If I do that, I will hopefully be able to
figure out how to improve their lives
and make this village better and better!
As for you, Master Link... I hope that you
will come and visit us anytime you please.
talk0149:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>It's nearly daybreak. Please take your
rest soon, Master Link.
talk0132:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Master Link... Thank you for stopping by,
even with all the rain.
talk0133:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>M-M...<sp:5:0:0>Master Link! That is to say... Um...<sp:5:1:0>


I'm terribly grateful that you've come to
speak with me. Truly. However...

You're, um...<sp:5:0:0>just a bit...<sp:5:1:0>a bit too...<sp:5:0:0>um...<sp:5:0:0>
just a bit underdressed, don't you think?
Talk0150:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>The Zonai Ruins that Tauro and Calip
went to...

I must admit that I'm not too
knowledgeable about that place.
However, this is what I know...
<sp:3:0:2:0501>There's an investigation site set up at the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower in the Popla Foothills<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>southwest <clr:ffff>of our village.
That's what they said, in any case.


<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Determination>I'm sure those two will be all right.
They are quite savvy.

I firmly believe...<sp:5:0:0>that they will make a
huge discovery about the Demon King
and the <clr:0000>sage <clr:ffff>called<clr:0000> Mineru<clr:ffff>.
Talk0151:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>The Upheaval brought with it big changes
for our village.

Afterward, we learned that the Ring Ruins
were true rarities, with certain features
that are not present anywhere else.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Because of that, we now have tourists
coming to the village to view them.
Can you believe it?
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Determination_01>From now on, the Ring Ruins will be the
cornerstone of ensuring the vitality of
our village...
As the Kakariko Village chief, that is how I
think of them. A blessing born of tragedy.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I haven't yet learned anything about
Princess Zelda's whereabouts, so I'm not
sure I'll be of any help to you. Still...
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Determination>Know that I will always support you. If you
ever need anything of this village, or if
anything transpires, we are here for you.
Talk0152:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> I neglected to tell you this
earlier, Master Link...

I have taken over the title of chief from
my grandmother.

Naturally, I still have a long way to go
before I truly earn that title, but I intend
to follow that path from first step to last.
talk0136:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>I'm on my way to the lab, so sadly I don't
have time to show you around. I do hope
you'll stay as long as you like though.
Ballon01_110: I must try hard as well...
talk0137:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>This is a <clr:0000>map of our village<clr:ffff>. It marks the
locations of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.

Members of the <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team <clr:ffff>can
be found at each location.

I encourage you to try speaking with
them. I hope that you will.

The team includes those who know a fair
bit about the sky islands. There's even a
gloom specialist.
They can speak knowledgeably on a
variety of topics.
Ballon01_111: As chief, it is up to me...
talk0139:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Determination_00>We must further our investigation of the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.

They have become a symbol of sorts for
our village. As chief...I feel that they are
my responsibility.
That's why I've been borrowing books and
learning all I can from Tauro about <clr:0000>how to
decipher Zonai writing<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It is difficult, and truth be told, I hardly
understand a thing. Still, I must try.
